sense.gloss: year in the Buddhist order (after the completion of the first meditation retreat)
becoming more experienced with age, social status based on this experience
to be elegant (usu. of a woman), to be graceful, to be refined
maid working in the domestic quarters of a shogun or daimyo (Edo period)
court ladies of the middle rank serving in the inner palace (Heian period)
female servant for a samurai family
lady-in-waiting working in the inner palace of the Edo castle (Edo period)
long time, long years of service
to become skilled through years of experience

words.gloss: year in the Buddhist order (after the completion of the first meditation retreat)
